root.name: Mega Man Xtreme
root.description: OverviewMega Man Xtreme, the first handheld game starring Mega Man X, was released on January 17, 2001 for the Game Boy Color, developed and published by Capcom. The game is a traditional action platformer in the same vein as other Mega Man games. Mega Man X must explore each stage, defeat its Robot Master, and claim their weapon before eventually facing off against Sigma.
